messages.body: $AAPL The Chinese smart phone maker was once considered a potential rival for the industry giants. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-xiaomi-trying-to-find-its-own-road-among-giants-like/

links.title: Xiaomi Trying to Find Its Own Road Among Giants Like Apple Inc. (AAPL) and Samsung
links.description: At one point, Chinese smart phone maker Xiaomi was deemed a potential threat to Apple Inc's (NASDAQ:AAPL) dominance in the space. That hasn't materialized, and the company is still feeling out its best path ahead. CNBC has the details on the situation at hand for the Apple rival.

messages.body: $AAPL https://appleinsider.com/articles/18/07/11/sonos-first-third-party-to-deliver-promised-airplay-2-support

links.title: Sonos first third party to deliver promised AirPlay 2 support
links.description: Sonos on Wednesday launched its promised support for AirPlay 2, initially available through the company's One, Beam, Playbase, and second-generation Play:5 speakers. The technology requires installing software updates, including a new version of Sonos Controller for iPhones and iPads, but having just a single compatible speaker will then enable AirPlay across any Sonos speaker in the same group, the company said.

$AAPL A new ad program focuses on different things that can be accomplished with an iPad. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-apple-inc-aapl-still-working-to-convince-ipad-users-of/

links.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Still Working to Convince iPad Users of Its Best Utility
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has released a new ad program that touts the various ways that users can benefit from using an iPad. According to one observer, that's a clear sign that the tech giant is still trying to convince prospective users on its best uses.
